title: Bone Sword
info: The Bone Sword is a melee weapon that has a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance to drop from Skeletons in the Cavern layer. While rare, it can be a useful weapon if obtained early in the game. Compared to other early-game swords, it swings slower and has slightly less knockback, but deals significantly more damage.
